title: Atom-Dominated Relay Catalysis of High-Entropy MXene Promotes Cascade Polysulfide Conversion for Lithium-Sulfur Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03402C, Paper
Xu Mengyao, Qizhen Zhu, Yanze Li, Yuan Gao, Ning Sun, Bin Xu
To address the challenges in Li-S batteries, i.e. the shuttle effect and lithium dendrite formation, a high-entropy MXene (HE-MXene) of TiVNbMoC3 with four size-compatible transition metal elements uniformly dispersed in...
